8.text:
Ashley: Hi, guys, and welcome to our very
special Alcatel One Touch Fashion Competition

13.text:
Today I’m going to be going out and finding
the best dressed individual - male or female

19.text:
- judged by yours truly, and I’ll give the
winner an Alcatel Onetouch idol mini smart

26.text:
phone. So shall we go find the winner? Let’s
go!

35.text:
I am a big fan of the girl sat right behind
us. She’s got amazing red hair: I’m a

41.text:
huge fan of anyone with red hair. And she’s
wearing, like a really relaxed plaid dress

47.text:
and these like black cutaway boots that are
really in right now. So I love her outfit,

53.text:
I can’t fault her, but I think I can find
better.

60.text:
I love what that girls wearing. She’s kind
of really incorporated the 90s revival trend

65.text:
right now. So she’s got her denim dungarees
on, she’s got some plaid, she’s got really

70.text:
chunky boots – they look like they could
be Doc Martens but I didn’t see. So I love

75.text:
what she’s wearing, I can’t fault her.
But I still think that we can do better! It’s

79.text:
an Alcatel Onetouch phone we have to get the
best.

84.text:
I love the guy standing behind me’s style.
He’s got amazing bleached hair, plain black,

89.text:
he’s looking very cool, eating an ice cream,
so he probably feels very cool as well. So,

94.text:
I love what he’s wearing but I still think
we can do better.

104.text:
I think we have found our winner! What’s
your name and what do you do for work?

107.text:
Connie: I’m Connie and I work for a salvage
company.

110.text:
Ashley: You look absolutely incredible, where
do you get your inspiration from?

114.text:
C: I don’t know. I guess it’s a bit
of everything. Um, I do like vintage, obviously

122.text:
A: So do you look up to any particular celebrities
for fashion inspiration?

126.text:
C: No, to be honest. Not really. I just go
with what I like and what is there.

130.text:
My shirt actually my sister bought me for
Christmas a couple of years ago, I think it’s

135.text:
from Warehouse. The trousers from a charity
shop, and so is the bag. My glasses were from

141.text:
A: So would you say that you don’t just
stick to high street.

144.text:
C: No not really, most of the stuff I get
is charity shops or eBay.

148.text:
A: As I said, you are our best-dressed person
that we found today. So I want to present

153.text:
you with an Alcatel Onetouch Idol mini smartphone.
So that is yours and well done for being – looking

163.text:
A: So, she was our winner and she seemed so
happy but I absolutely loved her head to toe

173.text:
vintage style. I’d love to know what you
guys thought of my winner so make sure you

177.text:
let us know in the comments below and stay
tuned for more Alcatel Onetouch competitions.
